item.title: Personal Website Workshop
item.description: Getting Started Install Code Editor: VScode Install Package Manager: Homebrew /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)" Install Static Site Generator Hugo brew install hugo Follow the directions on the terminal output Create your Website Run the following commands in your terminal Create Hugo Project hugo new site quickstart -f yml Install Theme cd quickstart git init git submodule add https://github.com/adityatelange/hugo-PaperMod.git themes/PaperMod Open the project in VSCode open . -a Vscode.app Copy the following code into your config.
